title: Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site: Education
body: Sandburg in the Classroom Teach your students about one of the most famous American Poets of our time.  Resources cover Poetry, Literature, Social Studies, History and even Science!  Opportunities include:  Plan a Field Trip Traveling Trunks Student Poetry Contest In-class curriculum resources and more!                    Plan a Field Trip Bring your class to the Sandburg Home for an exciting adventure. Read More        Virtual Museum Exhibit This exhibit explores the Sandburg family while they lived at Connemara through their personal belongings and memorabilia. Read More        Where to? What next? Education film Use Sandburg as a story guide then guide your students through a fun exercise to tell their own stories, where they came from, and where they're going Read More
